449c3b7d-8632-4c5a-b247-155d293edb12.description: The earner of this badge has completed the basic Five9 Sales Certification coursework. Through this certification they have a knowledge of who Five9 is and how Five9 is differentiated in the marketplace. They understand the Five9 product portfolio and which products should be recommended to customers based on that customer's challenges, needs and technology. The earner also understands what resources are available to support them to best serve the customer.
449c3b7d-8632-4c5a-b247-155d293edb12.name: Five9 Sales Certified

badge_template_activities.title: The earner consumed self-paced, on-demand content in 6 modules. Each module contained 1-3 tracks and each track resulted in a short quiz of 1-5 questions. At the end of the 6 modules, the earner took a final exam that consisted of 20 questions. 80% or higher pass rate was required to become Five9 Sales Certified.

3fb5a19d-4b74-4f4e-8947-dd15f10cedf5.description: The earner of this badge has completed the Five9 Advanced Sales Certification coursework. Through this certification, they have advanced knowledge of Five9, the CCaaS market, how to best help their customers based on their needs, the buyer personas, and the pain points that various vertical markets experience in providing the best customer experience. Potential customers can be assured that the partner that is Advanced Sales Certified has the knowledge to sell Five9 products and offerings.
3fb5a19d-4b74-4f4e-8947-dd15f10cedf5.name: Five9 Advanced Sales Certified

badge_template_activities.title: The earner consumed self-paced, on-demand content in 6 modules. Each module contained 1-3 tracks and each track resulted in a short quiz of 1-5 questions. At the end of the 6 modules, the earner took a final exam that consisted of 20 questions. 80% or higher pass rate was required to become Five9 Advanced Sales Certified.

2f74ac83-d0cd-4c3a-97fd-5a607ab60c57.description: Five9 Independent Software Vendors are a foundation of Five9's plan to move upmarket, support and deliver large global solutions, and drive world-class customer experience. Leveraging Five9 technology along with the thought leadership and delivery capabilities of our ISV partners, we can deliver unparalleled value to clients worldwide.
2f74ac83-d0cd-4c3a-97fd-5a607ab60c57.name: Five9 Global Partner - Independent Software Vendor - Accredited

badge_template_activities.title: Five9 ISV Accredited Partners have proven that their solutions integrate with Five9 to create a more enhanced experience when using the Five9 Intelligent Cloud Contact Center.

610cdba0-f61c-4f2c-8332-a124d6dfba91.description: Our Implementation Partner certification badge assures customers that they are working with a partner who has committed to the highest level of Professional Services and has completed all of the required training and certifications with the Five9 solution suite.
610cdba0-f61c-4f2c-8332-a124d6dfba91.name: Five9 Global Partner - Certified Implementation Partner

badge_template_activities.title: Partner Achievements: - Five9 University Online Training: Admin, Supervisor, Agent, Reporting & Integrations. Partner is required to pass the Admin Certifications. - Five9 Implementation Bootcamp for Partners: Implementation Engineer Bootcamp and Virtual Instructor-led sessions. - Five9 Advanced Courses: Completed the IVR Integrations w/ the Query Module, Five9 ISCE Certification & Outbound Dialer- Level 2 training. - Project Shadowing and Five9 Experience - Five9 Certified Implementor

486ed1a4-888b-4902-8ef9-94f816bba8d2.description: The Five9 Partner Program structure defines three Partner levels: Gold, Silver, and Authorized. Partners must maintain the requirements and commitments outlined in the Five9 Global Partner Program, which focuses on performance, competencies, marketing investment, and customer satisfaction in order to remain at each level. Requirements are governed on an annual basis.
486ed1a4-888b-4902-8ef9-94f816bba8d2.name: Five9 Global Partner - Authorized Level

badge_template_activities.title: Five9 values the investment our partners make to effectively position and deliver our solutions and has developed a Partner Program to reward these efforts. The Five9 Partner Program rewards Partners that demonstrate strength in revenue achievement and growth, education, and other key commitment areas, which earn a higher status within the Partner Program.

a46aff91-fd1c-47f8-8935-87ea38665480.description: Our CINP certification badge assures customers that they are working with a partner who has committed to the highest level of service in support of network integration with the Five9 solution suite.
a46aff91-fd1c-47f8-8935-87ea38665480.name: Five9 Global Partner - Certified Integrated Network Partner

badge_template_activities.title: CINP Requirements: 1. Regulatory Elements - National or Global Footprint (regulatory designation) 2. Infrastructure Requirements - Datacenter Redundancy (Resilient and Scalable) - Secure (Private, Public or Hybrid Cloud) Connections - Network Documentation Package Certified 3. Operational Interlock - Operational Documentation Package Certified 4. GTM Alignment - Packaged Commercial 5. Alignment for Simplified CX Annual verification

837a2da7-624c-4be3-ad15-5abfff8ad687.description: The Five9 Partner Program structure defines three Partner levels: Gold, Silver, and Authorized. Partners must maintain the requirements and commitments outlined in the Five9 Global Partner Program, which focuses on performance, competencies, marketing investment, and customer satisfaction in order to remain at each level. Requirements are governed on an annual basis.
837a2da7-624c-4be3-ad15-5abfff8ad687.name: Five9 Global Partner - Gold Level

badge_template_activities.title: Five9 values the investment our partners make to effectively position and deliver our solutions and has developed a Partner Program to reward these efforts. The Five9 Partner Program rewards Partners that demonstrate strength in revenue achievement and growth, education, and other key commitment areas, which earn a higher status within the Partner Program.

ba00eb01-0ce0-4d9c-94e2-3df1dedc9fea.description: Five9 forms alliances with the leading SI’s who deliver best-in-class transformational solutions. The Five9 Global System Integrator that earned this badge designation has demonstrated excellence in deploying and integrating Five9 capabilities that ensure our mutual customer's goals and objectives will be met.
ba00eb01-0ce0-4d9c-94e2-3df1dedc9fea.name: Five9 Global Partner - Global System Integrator

badge_template_activities.title: The Five Global Systems Integration partner met all training and educational requirements including the successful deployments and integrations with Five9 across multiple clients achieving positive business outcomes.

18e7d4f3-eb53-43bf-9d8a-5bfda1f08e57.description: The Five9 Partner Program structure defines three Partner levels: Gold, Silver, and Authorized. Partners must maintain the requirements and commitments outlined in the Five9 Global Partner Program, which focuses on performance, competencies, marketing investment, and customer satisfaction in order to remain at each level. Requirements are governed on an annual basis.
18e7d4f3-eb53-43bf-9d8a-5bfda1f08e57.name: Five9 Global Partner - Silver Level

The Five9 Partner Program rewards Partners that demonstrate strength in revenue achievement and growth, education, and other key commitment areas, which earn a higher status within the Partner Program.

a0f17e5d-ce2f-4ab9-84f8-a695f8571016.description: The earner of this badge has completed the Five9 IVA Sales Certification coursework. Through this certification, they have acquired knowledge of the evolution of Conversation AI, understand the Five9 Digital Workforce advantages, and can guide customers to implementing Five9 IVAs to create an exceptional CX journey for their customers while creating efficiencies for their customer's contact center agent.
a0f17e5d-ce2f-4ab9-84f8-a695f8571016.name: Five9 IVA Sales Certified
